feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix azure openai by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16253
  • Fix broken Dropzone test by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16258
  • Google sheet improvements by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16257
  • Add CLAUDE.md by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16268
  • Upgrade lerna to 8.0.1 by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16161
  • Revert "Upgrade lerna to 8.0.1 (#16161)" by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16272
  • Handle screen conflicts between workspace apps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16221
  • Behaviour when deleting all workspace apps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16264
  • Adding some directions around pull requests to CLAUDE.md by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16275
  • Fix: Loop step failing to iterate arrays from JavaScript steps by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16265
  • AI Data extraction automation step by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16230
  • Navigation per workspace app by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16203
  • Update AI JS generation prompt to start minimised. by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16283
  • [Added] Models needed for actions tracking by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16286
  • Revert "[Added] Models needed for actions tracking" by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16290
  • Ensure flag reverts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16281
  • [Fixed] Update environment script paths to include 'dev' directory by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16297
  • Make sure we're waiting for jobs to finish before shutting down. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16133
  • Make sure Google Sheets can handle the columns of the sheet being re-ordered outside of Budibase. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16280
  • Fix timeout errors causing step history to be lost. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16259
  • [BUDI-9382] Fix SSO enforcement preventing bulk user imports by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16274
  • Add AI Agents with Tool Source Management by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16267
  • Allow selection of relationship fields in junction tables when using the Create Row automation step. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16266
  • Add some browser use instructions to CLAUDE.md. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16307
  • Fixes condition checking if a column can be hidden by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16242
  • [Added] Actions tracking by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16312
  • Set actionsLimit to unlimited for now by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16315

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.8...3.12.9

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Support importing workspaces by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16316
  • 16282 expand visible text when resizing panel width by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16295
  • Adding some notes about building test cases for Claude by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16319
  • Create a default admin user in local dev that Claude knows about. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16314
  • Remove TODO comment actionsQuota by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16320
  • Rename app labels to workspaces by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16288
  • Apps to workspaces exports by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16294
  • Consider apps with future migrations as fully migrated, and fix migrations UI by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16318
  • Increment actions usage count on automation step execution by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16322
  • 16080 enhance the navigation settings area and include some more features by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16204
  • Support workspaces when using templates by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16321

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.9...3.12.10

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Apps to workspaces in account by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16327
  • Typing user section by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16325
  • Pull in latest pro. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16328
  • Fix app creation after some refactors by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16330

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.10...3.12.11

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix importing app by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16331

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.11...3.12.12

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allowing admins and builders to access agent chat/history by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16333
  • Fix nav item widths and scrolling by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16332
  • [BUDI-9375] Return 400 if the user attempts to filter on an unknown field. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16326

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.12...3.12.13
